text: Christopher Wesson Bosh (born March 24, 1984 in Dallas, Texas) is an American former professional basketball player. He attended college at Georgia Tech where he played basketball. Chris Bosh started his NBA career when he was drafted by the Toronto Raptors in the 2003 NBA Draft with the 4th pick in the 1st round. Bosh would play 7 seasons with the Raptors becoming a star player before doing a sign-and-trade deal with the Miami Heat after the 2009â€“10 NBA season. == Other websites == *Chris Bosh's Official website Category:1984 births Category:Living people Category:African-American basketball players Category:American basketball players Category:Centers (basketball) Category:Medalists at the 2008 Summer Olympics Category:Miami Heat players Category:National Basketball Association players with retired numbers Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Power forwards Category:Sportspeople from Dallas Category:Toronto Raptors players
title: Chris Bosh
